author: Jonah Blocker
title: Senator Tom Cotton: “This is an example of Chinese treachery”
description: On the latest Hemmer Time podcast, Bill Hemmer is joined by Senator Tom Cotton (R-AR), to address the latest revelations about the origins of the coronavirus in China.
content:
On the latest Hemmer Time podcast, Bill Hemmer is joined by Senator Tom Cotton (R-AR), to address the latest revelations about the origins of the coronavirus in China.
Bill and Senator Cotton discuss the latest reporting that suggests the coronavirus, while … [+278 chars]
